content.thinking: Let me analyze this document carefully following the classification workflow: ## 1. TEXT EXTRACTION The document appears to be a "Certificacion de Participacion Accionaria" (Shareholder Participation Certificate) for a company called VP GLOBAL LTDA. Main text elements: - Title: "CERTIFICACION DE PARTICIPACION ACCIONARIA" - Company name: "V.P. GLOBAL LTDA." - Table with shareholders information showing: - Names of shareholders - Document type (all CC - Citizenship ID) - Document numbers - Number of shares/quotas - Total value - Participation percentages - Nationality (all Colombian) - Total rows showing 386,000 quotas with a total value of 3,860,000,000 - A statement that the undersigned accountant certifies the shareholder composition - Signed in Barranquilla on April 23, 2021 - Signature by Katherine Charris Robles, Public Accountant, license number T.P 194697-T - Contact information for different cities The document clearly shows the ownership structure of the company with specific shareholders, their ownership percentages, and identification numbers. ## 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - Not BLANK: Document has substantial content - Not LINK_ONLY: No hyperlinks as primary content ## 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION - Corporate entity: VP GLOBAL LTDA is issuing this certification - Certified by a public accountant - Not issued by DIAN or Chamber of Commerce ## 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS - The document's function is to certify the ownership structure of VP GLOBAL LTDA - It shows shareholders with their exact participation percentages - It contains detailed ownership data (number of shares, values, percentages) - It's signed by an official accountant, giving it legal validation ## 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION Going through the classification order: - Not CECRL: This is not a personal identification document - Not RUT: This is not a tax registration document from DIAN - Not CERL: This is not a certificate of legal existence and representation from Chamber of Commerce - ACC: This document matches all the must-have indicators for shareholder certification - Not RUB: This is not a beneficial ownership report for DIAN - Not POR_REVISAR: Classification is clear The document shows: - Clear shareholder terminology ("CERTIFICACION DE PARTICIPACION ACCIONARIA") - Ownership data with percentages (49%, 49%, 1%, 1%) - Number of shares/quotas (189,140, 189,140, 3,860, 3,860) - Monetary values (1,891,400,000, 38,600,000) - Owner identification with names and ID numbers - Certification by an accountant ## 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION This document clearly fits the ACC category with strong evidence: - The title explicitly states it's a shareholder participation certification - Contains a detailed breakdown of shareholders with percentages - Includes share values and numbers - Is certified by a professional (public accountant) - Shows the complete ownership structure of the company The document is a classic example of an "ACC" - shareholder structure certification document.
